scripts.ai-run-first:
echo "
🤖 FLOWMCP SCHEMA REPOSITORY - AVAILABLE COMMANDS

=== 🧪 TESTING & VALIDATION ===
• npm run test:new-schemas    - Test all schemas in tests/new-schemas/ (live API calls)
• npm run test:schemas        - Alias for test:new-schemas
• npm run validate:ai         - Generate AI validation report with detailed analysis
• npm run validate:flowmcp     - Test FlowMCP schema loading functionality

=== 🔍 DEVELOPMENT TOOLS ===
• npm run inspector           - Start MCP Inspector for schema debugging
• npm run ai-run-first        - Show this help (run this first!)

=== 📁 TARGET DIRECTORIES ===
• tests/new-schemas/          - New schemas for testing
• schemas/v1.2.0/             - Production-ready schemas
• schemas/not_supported/      - Non-functional schemas

=== 🎯 USAGE EXAMPLES ===
• npm run test:new-schemas    # Test all new schemas
• npm run validate:ai         # Get detailed AI analysis
• npm run inspector           # Debug schemas interactively

📋 Start with: npm run test:new-schemas
"
